creditline: The Anne and Hadlai Hull Fund
description: standing black woman wearing a long skirt and a sleeveless blouse made of the same fabric printed with double hearts pierced with an arrow and the words, "AMOUR" and "MA CHERIE"; woman also wear gold hoop earrings and a printed headwrap and carries a purse with a diamond design; checked floor; cloth backdrop with a painted backdrop of column and flowers at left
signed: on back in pencil: Sory Sanle 2018 / AMOUR, MA CHÉRIE, 1970/2018
title: Amour, ma chérie
